name: Open Woodland
description:
Open Woodland in Early Afternoon
Designed by NickCunninghamArt for DEM3 Anthropology Textbooks

Runs on PC, Android Tablets.
WebGL 2.0 is not yet supported on iOS devices.

Page may be slow to load the first time. Wait 10 full seconds.  You can view a walkthrough of the simulation here. 

Keyboard Controls:

  • Left click:  Enters the scene
  • ESC:  Return to normal mouse controls 
  • W: move forward
  • A: move left
  • S: move back
  • D: move right
  • Mouse: camera angle/view

Touchscreen controls: 

  • Arrows: move in any direction
  • Eye: camera angle/view
